name: Kajal Raj
position: Certified Professional Scrum Master, Automation QA Lead

certifications.subtitle: ASTQB - ISTQB in the U.S. - Official Page
certifications.title: ISTQB Certified Tester (CTFL)

recommendations: Kevin Cheddar “Kajal is a diligent QA Lead who has great attention to detail and is very pleasant to work with. She found bugs and inconsistencies in areas that others missed and helped bring our applications to a higher level of quality. She also helped onboard other QA analysts and provided suggestions to improve our teamwork.”

Matthew Kupstas, PMP “Kajal is a hard working and talented QA team member. She is extremely thorough often catching issues that others do not find. She has a great attitude and successfully navigates the relationship with the developers. She was instrumental in the high quality the team produced at Varis. She would make a fantastic addition to any software engineering team.”
